ArtistOut.description: Artist metadata enriched with the latest known releases.
ArtistOut.title: ArtistOut

DownloadEntryResponse.description: Download information returned to API consumers.
DownloadEntryResponse.title: DownloadEntryResponse

DownloadFileRequest.description: Input payload for an individual download request.

filename.description: Resolved filename that should be stored for the download
filename.title: Filename

name.description: Original filename reported by the client (fallback field)
name.title: Name

priority.description: Explicit priority override for this download
priority.title: Priority

source.description: Origin of the download request, e.g. spotify_saved
source.title: Source

DownloadFileRequest.title: DownloadFileRequest

EnqueueSyncRequest.description: Request payload for triggering an artist sync.
EnqueueSyncRequest.title: EnqueueSyncRequest

FreeLinksRequest.description: Input payload accepting a single URL or multiple URLs.
FreeLinksRequest.title: FreeLinksRequest

ReleaseOut.description: Serialised representation of a persisted artist release.
ReleaseOut.title: ReleaseOut

SearchRequest.description: Schema describing the smart search payload.

format_priority.description: Preferred audio formats used for secondary sorting
format_priority.title: Format Priority

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return
limit.title: Limit

year_from.description: Lower bound of the release year (inclusive)
year_from.title: Year From

year_to.description: Upper bound of the release year (inclusive)
year_to.title: Year To

SearchRequest.title: SearchRequest

SearchResponse.description: Envelope returned by the smart search endpoint.
SearchResponse.title: SearchResponse

url.description: Original URL submitted by the user
url.title: Url

SoulseekDownloadResponse.description: Response payload when a Soulseek download is queued.
SoulseekDownloadResponse.title: SoulseekDownloadResponse

SoulseekSearchResponse.description: Response payload for Soulseek search results.
SoulseekSearchResponse.title: SoulseekSearchResponse

authenticated.description: Indicates if the Spotify client currently holds a valid session.
authenticated.title: Authenticated

free_available.description: Whether FREE ingest features are available.
free_available.title: Free Available

pro_available.description: Whether Spotify API integrations are configured.
pro_available.title: Pro Available

WatchlistItemIn.description: Input payload for upserting watchlist entries.
WatchlistItemIn.title: WatchlistItemIn

reason.description: Optional note explaining why the artist is paused
reason.title: Reason

resume_at.description: Optional timestamp describing when to revisit the pause
resume_at.title: Resume At

app__schemas__artists__EnqueueResponse.description: Response payload returned when scheduling an artist sync.
app__schemas__artists__EnqueueResponse.title: EnqueueResponse

get.description: Return general application status data for the dashboard.

schema.title: Response Get Status Api V1 Status Get
